330120.「主神グランゼニスよ。よくぞ ご無事で！\n 先刻 ジア・クトの軍勢が飛び去るさ:
Gran Zenith. I'm so glad you're safe! I saw
Dia Kut's army flying away a few minutes
ago...

330124.「……なるほど。ウォルドの聖なる水に\n 守られし 地下神殿に\n 己が身を封じ:
I see...so you are protecting Zeniath by
sealing yourself in a subterranean temple
protected by the holy waters of Angelfall.

330125.「ならば その前に すべての元凶である\n 女神ゼネシアを 罰するべきです！:
Then, before we do that, we should punish the
source of all this, Goddess Zenethia!

330127.「まだ かばいだてを なさるか！？\n 大樹の鳥籠に 幽閉するだけでは 手ぬるい:
You still want to protect him? You must make a
ruthless decision for Zeniath's sake!

330130.「二度目はない……と せめて\n そう お誓いください。\n ゼニアスと ゼニア:
Please pledge at least that it will not happen
again, for the sake of Zeniath and the people
who live in Zeniath.

330133.「……なんと。\n かの女神は とうに 息絶えたのか……！: Oh my... The goddess has died out at last...!

330136.「あんっだけ言っても 聞く耳 持たねぇとは\n とんだ 親バカ じいさんだぜ……:
I told him so much but he wouldn't listen to
me... He's a fool grandpa... And then he
forces me to clean up after him!

330137.「あーあ！ こーんな オヤジ丸出しの\n ゴッツ～い姿に なっちまうたぁ！\n:
Oh, no! I've turned into this old man's bare,
grotesque figure! Poor me!

330139.「創失の呪いは すさまじいモンだ。\n 我々 天使ですら 消え去るかもしれねぇ。:
The curse of unmaking is tremendous. Even we
angels may disappear. This time Zeniath is
finished.

330140.「呪いが ウォルドから 漏れ出さねェように\n 峠のほこらを 閉ざした後……\n:
After closing the Mountain Pass Shrine to prevent the curse from leaking out of Angelfall I will hide in the Grounds of the
Covenant.

330141.「リムネル。悪ぃが お前はなんとか耐えてくれ。\n もしもの時は 湖に 身を隠せ:
Rimnel, I'm sorry, but you're going to have to endure this. If things go wrong, hide yourself in the lake. The holy water will protect you
from the curse.

330143.「ゼネシアには 気をつけろ。\n いかなることが あろうと\n けっして あいつ:
Beware of Zenethia. Never, under any
circumstances, appear in front of her.

330144.「しかし 女神ゼネシア様は 大樹の鳥籠に\n 封じられております。\n もう 心:
However, Goddess Zenethia is sealed in The
Tree's Cage. I guess we don't have to worry
anymore...?

330145.「ゼネシアは 時を超えるチカラを得た。:
Zenethia has gained the power to transcend
time.

330146.「伝説に聞く 時の民の世界に 手を出したか\n それとも 他の手段によってか\n:
I don't know if he's messing with the legendary world of the Time People or if he's doing it by other means, but whatever the
case, he's going through time.

330147.「今 幽閉されてるからって 油断すんなヨ？\n お前ら 純朴な天使じゃ コロッと:
Don't let your guard down just because you're locked up now, okay? You naive angels can be easily tricked into thinking that you're being
beaten up.

330148.「……じゃあな。\n お互い 運が良けりゃ また会おうぜ！:
Well then. If we're both lucky, we'll see each
other again!

330149.「……うむ。仇敵 ジア・クトは\n 我が 創失の呪いを恐れて 去った。\n 長き:
...Mm. Our enemy, Dia Kut, has left, fearing
the curse of my unmaking. The long battle is
over.

330150.「他に 手はなかったとはいえ\n このままでは 創失の呪いがゼニアスを滅ぼす。\:
Though I had no other choice, the curse of
unmaking will destroy Zeniath if it continues.
Therefore, I must seal myself off.

330152.「……すべての咎は 我にある。\n それに……娘ゼネシアは すでに罰した。\n:
All the blame is mine. Besides I have already
punished my daughter Zenethia. She will never
be able to misbehave again.

330153.「かつて 我が過ちを 身を挺して正し\n 赦してくれた者がいた……。:
There was once someone who took the risk to
right my wrongs and forgive me...

330154.「ならば 我も また……\n 娘の過ちを赦し 正さねばならぬだろう……。:
Then I, too, must forgive and right my
daughter's wrongs.

330155.「……よかろう。ここに 誓おう。\n その証として そなたに 我が記憶を託す。\:
...all right. I hereby pledge. To prove it, I
entrust my memory to you. I'll leave the rest
to you...

330157.<center>マギエルよ……ルティアナが 還る日まで\n ……ゼニアスを 頼ん:
Magiel, until the day of Lutiana's return,
Zeniath, please...!
